Prefect Vokian: To rebuild the kingdom of Orcs we must first crush the dissent within the kingdom! We must make the renegade Orcs return to the kingdom. Hundreds of years ago these apostates denied the Lord of Flame's authority and abandoned the kingdom. If you will lead the force to subjugate them once again to the great kingdom of Orc, you shall be rewarded with a Mark of Glory by the Monarch. This will ensure your promotion to a higher level! But first you must be tested to see if you are worthy to be the representative of the Monarch! Are you ready for the test?
